statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT user_id, amount, category FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE category='Shopping' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE user_id = 12345 AND category='Grocery' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, category, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT t.transaction_date, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01' AND join_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE category = 'Groceries'
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 500;
SELECT users.username, categories.category_name FROM users JOIN categories ON users.user_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT full_name, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, preferred_category, notification_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_settings = true;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, category_name FROM user_accounts JOIN transaction_categories ON user_accounts.user_id = transaction_categories.category_id;
SELECT user_id, preferred_category FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_settings = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 500);
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT th.transaction_id, tc.category_id FROM transaction_history th JOIN transaction_categories tc ON th.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_date, td.user_name, sc.category_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN user_transactions ut ON th.transaction_id = ut.transaction_id JOIN user_details td ON ut.user_id = td.user_id JOIN transaction_categories tc ON th.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN spending_categories sc ON tc.category_id = sc.category_id;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY user_id, transaction_id ASC;

SELECT th.transaction_id, th.transaction_amount, td.user_name, tc.category_id, sc.category_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN user_transactions ut ON th.transaction_id = ut.transaction_id JOIN user_details td ON ut.user_id = td.user_id JOIN transaction_categories tc ON th.transaction_id = tc.transaction_id JOIN spending_categories sc ON tc.category_id = sc.category_id WHERE td.user_name LIKE '%John%' AND th.transaction_amount < 500;
